snippet: The Supreme Court left a good ruling alone when it let stand the rejection of Arizona’s 20-week abortion ban.
abstract: Editorial welcomes Supreme Court decision not to review 2013 federal appeals ruling that struck down Arizona's 20-week abortion ban as unconstitutional; holds ruling was essential to protecting women's reproductive rights in state.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court left a good ruling alone when it let stand the rejection of Arizona’s 20-week abortion ban.

headline.main: Abortion Rights: A Good Ruling Stands
headline.print_headline: They Left a Good Ruling Alone
